</div> </body>
</html>

src="http://bo.nts.nl/docs_extract_new/documentFiles/Copy2 of C001 Moodle tutorial/images/image82.png" style="width: 453.00px; height: 74.50px; margin-left: 0.00px; margin-top: 0.00px; transform: style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">for the video below</span></p><p otherwise your video would not be seen or played in moodle</span></p><p </div> </body>

style="padding:0;margin:0;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";line-height:1.15;orphans:2;widows:2;height:10pt;text-align:left"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Adding/Editing/Importing questions to course</span></p><p style="padding:0;margin:0;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";line-height:1.15;orphans:2;widows:2;height:10pt;text-align:left"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal"></span></p><ol class="lst-kix_sph79v60m1az-0 start" start="1" style="padding:0;margin:0"><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">From the projects programs New Documents > Questions tab</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Importing from google document</span></li></ol><p style="padding-top:12pt;margin:0;color:#000000;padding-left:0;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;font-family:"Calibri";line-height:1.0;orphans:2;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:700;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Adding from Projects Question Tab</span></p><p style="padding-top:12pt;margin:0;color:#000000;padding-left:0;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;font-family:"Calibri";line-height:1.0;orphans:2;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">From the projects tree menu,  button Show, select Moodle Content. This will list the moodle courses that are available.</span></p><ol class="lst-kix_jnhxk5j1sg3h-0 start" start="1" style="padding:0;margin:0"><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Select the moodle course of interest and on the right section, in the list of tabs select New Documents tab.</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">The course will be listed in the Project Documents grid. Select the course.</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">In the bottom section select Table of content tab, here you will find the course content tree, which includes course topics as the first level,  Lesson or page as the second level and lesson pages as the third level.</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">To add question(s) to a page, select the desired page(third level row), then on the right section select question tab.</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">From the question tab toolbar, use the new button to add a new question, this button lists the various types of questions that can be added.</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Click the question type that you wish to add and a new question will be created with the default question properties. </span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">To edit/update the details of the question, select the question and edit from the form that shows the question details. Thereafter click save to persist the changes.</span></li></ol><p style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Supported question types include:</span></p><p style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Essay - has free answer,</span></p><p style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Multichoice - answer is from a list of supplied options,</span></p><p style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Numerical - answer is a specified numerical value,</span></p><p style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Short Answer - answer is a specified string</span></p><p style="padding-top:12pt;margin:0;color:#000000;padding-left:0;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;font-family:"Calibri";line-height:1.0;orphans:2;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">For questions to be displayed correctly in moodle, they have to be supplied together with their associated  answers.</span></p><p style="padding-top:12pt;margin:0;color:#000000;padding-left:0;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;font-family:"Calibri";line-height:1.0;orphans:2;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:700;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Adding answers to question</span></p><ol class="lst-kix_e4x4wu5kor0l-0 start" start="1" style="padding:0;margin:0"><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Select the question, then select the answers tab</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Use the new button in the answers toolbar to add a new answer. A new answer record will be created.</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">To edit the answer details, select it from the grid, edit the details from the form and click save.</span></li></ol><p style="padding-top:12pt;margin:0;color:#000000;padding-left:0;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;font-family:"Calibri";line-height:1.0;orphans:2;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:700;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Exporting Questions to Moodle</span></p><ol class="lst-kix_6igcimdf76bb-0 start" start="1" style="padding:0;margin:0"><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">From the table of content, select the page with the questions you want to export</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Open the questions tab and click on export. The page  questions will be exported to moodle. Visit the moodle page to view the result.</span></li></ol><p style="padding-top:12pt;margin:0;color:#000000;padding-left:0;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;font-family:"Calibri";line-height:1.0;orphans:2;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="overflow: hidden; display: inline-block; margin: 0.00px 0.00px; border: 0.00px solid #000000; transform: rotate(0.00rad) translateZ(0px); -webkit-transform: rotate(0.00rad) translateZ(0px); width: 601.70px; height: 304.00px;"><img alt="" src="http://bo.nts.nl/docs_extract_new/documentFiles/Copy2 of C001 Moodle tutorial/images/image84.png" style="width: 601.70px; height: 304.00px; margin-left: 0.00px; margin-top: 0.00px; transform: rotate(0.00rad) translateZ(0px); -webkit-transform: rotate(0.00rad) translateZ(0px);" title=""></span></p><p style="padding-top:12pt;margin:0;color:#000000;padding-left:0;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;font-family:"Calibri";line-height:1.0;orphans:2;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:700;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Importing questions from google document</span></p><p style="padding:0;margin:0;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";line-height:1.15;orphans:2;widows:2;text-align:left"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">In order for questions to be extracted from documents to projects questions, the questions in the document have to follow a set of guidelines as stated below.</span></p><p style="padding:0;margin:0;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";line-height:1.15;orphans:2;widows:2;height:10pt;text-align:left"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal"></span></p><p style="padding:0;margin:0;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";line-height:1.15;orphans:2;widows:2;text-align:left"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">The question should have three sections which include: </span></p><ol class="lst-kix_6vdp8xplukvb-0 start" start="1" style="padding:0;margin:0"><li style="padding:0;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;line-height:1.15;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Question Title - this is specified by specifying the text as a heading 5. Can be written as (Question 1).</span></li><li style="padding:0;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;line-height:1.15;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Question text - should be below the question title, this is specified as normal text</span></li><li style="padding:0;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;line-height:1.15;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Answers  title - this is specified by setting the text as heading 6. </span></li><li style="padding:0;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;line-height:1.15;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Answer list - this is normal text, press enter to add more answers, add (1) to identify the correct answer</span></li></ol><p style="padding:0;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;line-height:1.15;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;height:10pt;text-align:left"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal"></span></p><p style="padding:0;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;line-height:1.15;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;height:10pt;text-align:left"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal"></span></p><p style="padding:0;margin:0;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";line-height:1.15;orphans:2;widows:2;text-align:left"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Example of question structure is as follows:</span></p><p style="padding:0;margin:0;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";line-height:1.15;orphans:2;widows:2;height:10pt;text-align:left"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal"></span></p><div>
</div> </body>
</html>

style="padding-top:12pt;margin:0;color:#000000;padding-left:0;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;font-family:"Calibri";line-height:1.0;orphans:2;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Thereafter, questions can be added in the following ways:</span></p><p style="padding-top:12pt;margin:0;color:#000000;padding-left:0;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;font-family:"Calibri";orphans:2;widows:2;height:10pt;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:700;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal"></span></p><ol class="lst-kix_gmiw55mg1mu4-0 start" start="1" style="padding:0;margin:0"><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">To import questions to course, select the course you need to add the questions to.</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Go to the main  questions tab, and click on import from google document.</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">On the popup enter the document url and click on import. This action will fetch all the questions from the document and add them to the selected course.</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">To link the questions to a lesson page,  go to the new documents tab and select the table of contents tab in the lower section.</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Select the desired page from the table of contents grid and then open tab questions on the right section.</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Click on the link button, a popup with all the questions linked to the selected course and not linked to the selected page will appear.</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Select all the questions you want to add to the specified page and click in the link button. The questions will now be added to the page.</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">From here the questions can be exported to moodle with the export button as described in the section above.</span></li></ol><p style="padding-top:12pt;margin:0;color:#000000;padding-left:0;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;font-family:"Calibri";line-height:1.0;orphans:2;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:700;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Import questions to page directly</span></p><ol class="lst-kix_wsoboy172f2i-0 start" start="1" style="padding:0;margin:0"><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Select the course containing the page you want to add questions to.</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span the tab table of contents.</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">In the table of contents, select  the desired page then open tab questions on the right section.</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">Click on the import from google document button and on the popup add the url to the document to import from, then click the import button. This action will import all the questions specified in the document to the selected page.</span></li><li style="padding-top:12pt;color:#000000;padding-left:0pt;font-size:10pt;padding-bottom:12pt;line-height:1.0;margin-right:0;margin-left:36pt;font-family:"Calibri";margin-top:0;orphans:2;margin-bottom:0;widows:2;text-align:left;padding-right:0"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:10pt;font-family:"Calibri";font-style:normal">From here the questions can be exported to moodle with the export button as described in the section above.</span></li></ol><div>
</div> </body>
</html>
